author: josander
msg: * STATUS: Voting for r8787 and r8753

author: breser
msg: Fix bug in perl bindings where strings that contained revision numbers that
hadn't been used in a IV context weren't accepted.
Use looks_like_number instead of SvIOK, since SvIOK only returns true
if the conversion has already been done.  While looks_like_number tells
you if it can be done.
Modify a test that uses a PV with a revision number in it and catches

author: rooneg
msg: fix a crash that occurs when a directory that has been manually deleted
by the user is copied via svn copy.
(setup_copy): don't pass a NULL url on to the rest of the copy code,
instead error out with SVN_ERR_ENTRY_MISSING_URL.  the NULL url will
just cause a crash later on, so returning an error seems safest.

author: breser
msg: STATUS: Add r8805, r8806 as 1.0.1 candidates.
